mapper.sql: mid, mname, url, path, iconCls, enabled, parent_mid, create_date, cteate_id
mapper.select: select m.*,r.rid,r.rname,r.rname_zh from admin_menu m left join admin_rule_menu mr on m.`mid`= mr.`mid` left join admin_rule r on mr.`rid`= r.`rid` WHERE m.`enabled`=2
mapper.insert:
insert into admin_menu
mid,
mname,
url,
path,
iconCls,
enabled,
parent_mid,
create_date,
cteate_id,
#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parentMid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{cteateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update admin_menu
mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iconCls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_mid = #{parentMid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cteate_id = #{cteateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update admin_menu set mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iconCls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_mid = #{parentMid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cteate_id = #{cteateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
